article_title: Obama Administration Also Promoting Fraud Through Obamacare

article_metadata.description: Add promoting healthcare fraud that will further increase taxpayers’ cost to the list of abysmal Obamacare shortcomings.  The extra-statutory decision of Health and Human Services Secretary, Kathleen Sebelius, to exempt health insurance purchased through government subsidized exchanges from the anti-kickback definition of “federal health care programs” is one deserving of [...]
article_metadata.author: Brett Joshpe
